directions.name: Instructions
directions.value: FLOORS/DILUTE CLEANING: Mix 1/8 cup per 1 gallon (1/2 bucket) of water. Usually no need to rinse. TOUGH JOBS: Pour directly on tough soil or on sponge. Wipe and rinse. **FINISHED WOOD: Use diluted only. Not recommended for carpets, copper or aluminum surfaces. If applied to stainless steel wipe dry immediately. Rinse hands after use. *A rinse is required for surfaces in direct contact with food. Not for use on food contact surfaces including dishes, glassware, cookware and utensils.

activeIngredientName.name: Active Ingredient Name
activeIngredientName.value: Water, C9-11 Pareth, Dipropylene Glycol Butyl Ether, Sodium C10-16 Alkylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Carbonate, C10-16 Alkyldimethylamine Oxide, Carboxymethyl Inulin, Benzisothiazolinone, Fragrances, Colorants.

ingredients.name: Ingredients
ingredients.value: Water, C9-11 Pareth, Dipropylene Glycol Butyl Ether, Sodium C10-16 Alkylbenzenesulfonate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Carbonate, C10-16 Alkyldimethylamine Oxide, Carboxymethyl Inulin, Benzisothiazolinone, Fragrances, Colorants

longDescription:
• Get a powerful clean and a great scent with Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner with Febreze Meadows & Rain scent. It cuts through 100% of dirt, grease, and grime, leaving the scent of Meadows & Rain liquid cleaner in its dirt-forsaken place.
  • Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner works all around the house! Use on everything from linoleum, to tile and finished hardwood floors, to toilets and bathtubs, and even garbage cans.
  • Cuts through 100% of dirt, grease and grime
  • Great for use on sinks, counters, stoves and more!
  • Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner is also available in Unstopables Fresh, Gain Original Fresh, Lavender and Lemon
  • Fresh scent of Meadows & Rain
  • 41 fl oz
  • A great addition to your cleaning supplies for effective and efficient cleaning
shortDescription: Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner muscles through 100% of dirt and grease for powerful, multi-surface cleaning. This floor cleaner for mopping is great for cleaning linoleum, tile & hardwood floors**. Use Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner as a bathroom cleaner to clean toilets, sinks, and bathtubs. This multi-surface cleaner even works outside on garbage cans, doors, and more. It makes cleaning your house that much easier and leaves the long-lasting freshness of Febreze Meadows & Rain scent behind. Add Mr. Clean’s 2X Concentrated Multi Surface, All Purpose Cleaner to your arsenal of cleaning supplies today! *vs. Mr. Clean Original **use diluted only. This product is a great addition to your cleaning supplies, ensuring effective and efficient cleaning.
